title: Strawberry shortcake
ingredients: ['250 g (8½ oz) self-raising flour', '1 tsp baking powder', '75 g (2½ oz) unsalted butter, cut into small pieces', '3 tbsp caster sugar', '1 egg, beaten', '4 tbsp semi-skimmed milk', '½ tsp pure vanilla extract', '1 tsp icing sugar', 'Strawberry filling', '350g strawberries', '90ml (3 fl oz) whipping cream', '85g (3 oz) Greek-style yogurt']
